A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie I've ever seen\, and that's saying a lot.   Star Wars has become a shell of itself\, as it is politicized and dumbed down with one dimensional plot devices and characters\, weak writing\, and a lack of creativity and substance.  I walked out of the theater wondering if I was living in the movie \"Idiocracy\"\, because all of the good reviews for the movie were completely misaligned with my own experience\, as well as the experience of my buddy's who went into the theater with me.
